SEARCH
Package UserSystem

Class DoctorMedicalRecordViewer

Object
DoctorMedicalRecordViewer
public class DoctorMedicalRecordViewer extends Object
The DoctorMedicalRecordViewer class provides functionality for doctors to view medical records of patients. It can display records for all patients or for a specific patient based on their ID.

  • Constructor Details

    • DoctorMedicalRecordViewer

      public DoctorMedicalRecordViewer(String UserId, Map<String,AppointmentOutcomeRecord> appointmentOutcomeRecords)
      Constructs a DoctorMedicalRecordViewer object.
      Parameters:
      UserId - the ID of the doctor using the viewer.
      appointmentOutcomeRecords - the map of appointment outcome records to be displayed.

  • Method Details

    • viewMedicalRecords

      public void viewMedicalRecords()
      Displays the medical records for all patients. Records are sorted by appointment date.

    • viewMedicalRecordsById

      public void viewMedicalRecordsById(String patientId)
      Displays the medical records for a specific patient based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient whose records are to be displayed.
